title: 2BR/2BA Smoke-Free Apartment with Access to Citrus and Garden Herb
posting_body: ['2 \xa0bedroom 2 bath 1096Sq.', 'Ft.', 'From $4,507/mo', 'Madrone', 'CALL US TODAY:', 'show contact info', 'x536', 'DESCRIPTION:', 'Madrone is now leasing this two-bedroom, two-bathroom apartment.', 'The home features a movable chef’s island, granite counters, a washer and dryer, and an extra linen storage.', 'This pet-friendly neighborhood also has an updated clubhouse, a fully equipped fitness center, and a heated swimming pool.', 'Pricing and availability are subject to change at any time.', 'OFFICE HOURS:', 'Monday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Tuesday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Wednesday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Thursday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Friday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Saturday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 5:00pm', 'Sunday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 5:00pm', 'PROPERTY AMENITIES:', '* ClubHouse', '*', 'FitnessCenter', '* NightPatrol', '* ShortTermLease', '* SmokeFree', '* HighSpeed', '* Laundry', '* OnsiteMaintenance', '* OnSiteManagement', '* Availability24Hours', '* PackageReceiving', '* Recycling', '* Pool', '* Sundeck', '* Spa', '* WirelessInternet', '* Elevator', '* Garage', '* StorageSpace', '*', 'Other', '* Transportation', '* CoverPark', '* Playground', '* JoggingWalkingTrails', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'CALL US TODAY!', 'show contact info', 'x536', 'Address:', '111 North Rengstorff Avenue Mountain View, CA 94043', 'Managed By: Prometheus Real Estate Group, Inc.*', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
